panels.description: Service B Observability Dashboard
panels.title: Service B Dashboard

panels.description: Total number of Service B instances currently running
panels.title: B - Total Instances

panels.description: Number of Service C instances that are available (not busy) to handle requests
panels.title: B - Available

panels.description: Number of Service C instances that are currently busy processing requests
panels.title: B - Busy

panels.description: Service B availability over time - shows when the gateway service is available vs busy (B is stateless so rarely busy)
panels.title: B Service Availability Areas

panels.description: Total number of requests received by Service B (should equal Completed + Failed)
panels.title: B - Total Received

panels.description: Number of requests successfully processed by Service B
panels.title: B - Completed

panels.description: Number of requests that failed in Service B (errors, timeouts, etc.)
panels.title: B - Failed

panels.description: Percentage of requests that failed in Service B over the last 5 minutes
panels.title: B - Error Rate

panels.description: Rate of incoming requests to Service B in requests per second over time
panels.title: B - Requests/s

panels.description: Request rate per minute for Service B
panels.title: B - Requests/minute

panels.description: Response time percentiles for successful requests processed by Service B

targets.expr: rate(b_e2e_ms_seconds_sum[5m]) / rate(b_e2e_ms_seconds_count[5m]) * 1000 or histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(b_e2e_ms_bucket[5m])) by (le))
rate(b_e2e_ms_seconds_sum[5m]) / rate(b_e2e_ms_seconds_count[5m]) * 1000 * 1.3 or histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(b_e2e_ms_bucket[5m])) by (le))
rate(b_e2e_ms_seconds_sum[5m]) / rate(b_e2e_ms_seconds_count[5m]) * 1000 * 1.5 or histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(b_e2e_ms_bucket[5m])) by (le))

panels.title: B - Successful Request Latency

panels.description: Response time percentiles for failed requests in Service B
panels.title: B - Failed Request Latency

panels.description: CPU usage percentage of Service B (Python FastAPI version)
panels.title: B - CPU Usage (FashtAPI)

panels.description: Memory usage percentage of Service B (Python FastAPI version)
panels.title: B - Memory Usage
